name: Mayano Topgun (umamusume)
description:
LoRA of Mayano Topgun (umamusume)

All of my works is free. If you'd like to support me, feel free to buy me a coffee. 👍

You Copy? I Copy~

Recommend options

  • LoRA weight 0.6~0.9

  • Trigger words

    • base

      • mayano topgun \(umamusume\)

    • Racing competition clothes :

      • dog tags, navel, brown thighhighs, midriff, yellow crop top, bomber jacket, white short shorts, green jacket, boots, brown footwear, open jacket

      • (optional) : thumbs up, sunglasses, aircarft

    • Casual clothes :

      • long sleeves, white shirt, plaid skirt, pleated skirt, yellow skirt, white belt, belt buckle, yellow vest, orange skirt

    • Wedding costume :

      • hair ornament, hair flower, official alternate costume, pantyhose, strapless dress, white gloves, fishnets, wedding dress, bare shoulders, pink dress, choker, holding bouquet, shoes, jewelry

    • Christmas costume :

      • christmas, red dress, red capelet, belt, santa hat, fur-trimmed capelet, santa costume, red headwear, official alternate costume, bell, ears through headwear, fur-trimmed dress

Use animefull based model

  • Settings

    • DPM++ Series(SDE Karras, 2M Karras, etc.)

    • about 20 steps, CFG scale 3.5~6.5

    • kl-f8-anime2.vae

    • CLIP skip = 1

    • If using highres

      • Latent series

      • Denoising strength 0.50~0.65

LoRA training info

  • trained on sd-scripts by kohya_ss. Thank you a lot!

  • based on Animefull-pruned

  • 206 images of mayano topgun

    • 4x low quality 78 images

    • 8x medium quality 68 images

    • 16x high quality 60 images

    • => 1 epoch = 1816 images

  • replaced character feature tags with mayano topgun \(umamusume\)

    • horse girl, horse tail, orange hair, orange eyes, etc.

  • using aspect ratio bucketing

  • resolution : 768x768

  • rank=alpha=16

  • using dadaptation

  • batch size = 4, 8 epochs trained

  • clip skip = 1

This LoRA may be compatible with animefull-based models (ex. AbyssOrangeMix Series...)

All uploaded images are generated by AOM3A1
